ygData.subject: Re: Getting The Enchant Silver Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: I had a friend that offered to go get the spell for me, but he didn t know Neriak as well as me.  Instead of him spending over 2 hours I spent 45 minutes with
ygData.messageBody:
I had a friend that offered to go get the spell for me, but he didn't
know Neriak as well as me. Instead of him spending over 2 hours I spent
45 minutes with his help. I guess if I let him go get the spell for me
that would be better role-playing.


-----Original Message-----
From: David Long [mailto:DPLong@...]
Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 2:27 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Getting The Enchant Silver Spell


From: "David Long" <DPLong@...>

the only problem with your way is that i think it doesnt take any skill
or thought (not meaning no disrespect to you ).a part of the game is
getting the spells with the char that needs it by using illision
spells,ect. or buying from one that can get it . probably my main
problem is that reminds me too much of Ultima online and the game abuse
that came so easly there .
